description: Factor level shows annual rape cake treatment

Factor level shows annual rape cake treatment, 1926-1940. From 1941 castor bean meal applied. Applied in autumn usually to stubble of previous crop. Annual application equivalent to approximately 96kgN/ha. No rape cake applied in fallow years

Factor level shows annual castor bean meal treatment, replaced rape cake in 1941. Applied in autumn usually to stubble of previous crop. Amount applied adjusted so that total application was equivalent to approximately 96kgN/ha. No rape cake applied in fallow years.
